sentences.en: ...an old colonial coffee hacienda in the Andes.
sentences.cn: ...安第斯山脉中的一个殖民地时代的老咖啡种植园。

sentences.en: Susan Cohen is designing the interiors for a huge hacienda - style home in Malibu, California.
sentences.cn: 然而,过程中他们亦有坚持自己想法的时候.

sentences.en: When the Hacienda died, many said a piece of Manchester died.
sentences.cn: 当“庄园”夜总会倒闭时, 许多人说,曼彻斯特的一部分完了.

sentences.en: Write your check payable to Hacienda Heights Chinese Seventh - day Adventist Church ( HHCSDA ).

trans.tran_cn: （讲西班牙语国家的）庄园住宅，大农场
trans.tran_en: a large farm in Spanish-speaking countries
